title: Best of the Program | Guests: Rob Eno & Grace Sambrano | 10/7/20
description:
Texas college student Grace Sambrano is being taught Marxist critical theory in class and Glenn breaks down how to counter its arguments. BlazeTV media critic Rob Eno dusts off his chemical engineering degree to break down the science behind face masks and why they’re not as effective as the media insists. Director of National Intelligence John Ratcliffe released documents proving that Russian intelligence claimed Hillary Clinton approved a plan to create a Trump/Russia scandal. And Trump authorized all such documents to be declassified. Jason Buttrill, head writer and chief researcher for Glenn Beck, joins to break down why this may be the smoking gun the Left knew they’d never find on Trump.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
